Module org.tquadrat.foundation.xml

Package org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi

@API(status=STABLE, since="0.1.0") package org.tquadrat.foundation.xml.builder.spi

Several classes that are not part of the API for the XML builder tools, but required to implement tools for other, XML-derived languages, like SVG or HTML.

Unless otherwise stated, null argument values will cause methods and constructors of all classes in this package to throw an Exception, usually a NullArgumentException, but in some rare cases, it could be also a NullPointerException.

    Description
    AttributeSupport
    This class provides the support for attributes to elements.
    ChildSupport
    This class provides the support for child elements and text to elements.
    Document<E extends Element>
    The definition for an SGML document.
    Element
    The definition for an SGML element.
    InvalidXMLNameException
    This Exception will be thrown when an invalid XML name is used for the creation of an XML element, attribute, or namespace.
    NamespaceSupport
    This class provides the support for namespaces to elements.
    SGMLPrinter
    Helper method for the conversion of SGML elements into a String.
    XMLElementAdapter
    The abstract base class for specialised implementations of XMLElement.
    XMLElementFactoryBase
    The default implementation of the interface XMLElementFactory.
